Text.val: If no data exists in the Address table, then create it.

ExpSyntax.val: 'DV11: How Do I Retrieve Data From Multiple Tables in a Single Task?'

Text.val: Note that "Record ID" has been named to "Record ID - hdr".
This is a convenient way to differentiate between fields with similar names, that come from different tables.
This virtual acts as a success flag, to determine if a record was found or not.
Fetch the record that matches this Record ID
The main record here may have multiple entries for one header entry.
Fetch the header that matches this phone number
The ID field name has been changed, so it's different from "Record ID" in the linked record.
